overview:
Kaboodle is a purpose-built cloud-based marketing collaboration platform.

With Kaboodle, marketers can plan, track, communicate, collaborate, share and manage campaigns from initial concept to completion.

Kaboodle is designed to support the way marketing campaigns are structured across integrated channels, with a visible hierarchy structure.

Kaboodle differs from traditional marketing management and support tools because it has been built by marketers for marketers. It is cloud-based so you just work through your favourite browser.

There is no need for months of implementation time or training, and no need to involve IT departments. Kaboodle is accessible on any device – from PC, Mac, iPad or smartphone and on all major browsers.

Kaboodle’s core features include:

Project Planning – decide who, what, where and when and create the plan. Allocate tasks, create timelines and milestones. View the whole project or just the section you are working on.

Campaign Hierarchy - creates content control, context, clarity and flow with the flexibility that ensures you work the way you want to.

Centralized documents – store documents and work-in-progress files at each hierarchy level, so they are in the most logical place for all the team to find and work on.

Annotate documents online – mark-up amends and make comments directly on 50 different file formats including video from within Kaboodle.

Review and approve – view full size documents without downloading. Activate approval or approve documents without leaving Kaboodle.

Search – you don’t need to think about where your documents are – just type a word into the search function and let Kaboodle do the work.

Reporting – export data to Excel with ease. Utilize powerful Business Intelligence capability in Kaboodle Professional and Unlimited.
